# Configuration

Most settings for `opentemplate` are managed in `pyproject.toml`,
with full flexibility for customization if needed.

Start here:

- [Basic](basic.md) – common settings for most use cases
- [Advanced](advanced.md) – for adding tool groups or complex changes

> [!TIP]
> For deeper insight and easier adjustments,
> see the [Details documentation](../details/index.md).
